## Podcasts

* [Learning Bayesian Statistics](https://creators.spotify.com/pod/show/learn-bayes-stats){target="_blank"} &nbsp; Alexandre Andorra.
A fortnightly podcast on Bayesian inference - the methods, the projects, and the people who make it possible!

* [Bayesian Statistics](https://www.superdatascience.com/podcast/bayesian-statistics){target="_blank"} &nbsp; John Krohn and Rob Trangucci.
An intro to Bayesian statistics - its history, tools you can use, plus a discussion of the uses of a PhD in statistics.
